phishing_samples.text: URGENT SECURITY ALERT! Your account will be suspended in 24 hours due to suspicious activity. Click here immediately to verify your identity: http://secure-bank-verification.com/urgent-verify
phishing_samples.label: phishing

phishing_samples.text: Congratulations! You've won $1,000,000 in our international lottery! Claim your prize now by clicking this link and providing your bank details.
phishing_samples.label: phishing

phishing_samples.text: Your PayPal account has been limited due to unusual activity. Please verify your account immediately to avoid permanent suspension.
phishing_samples.label: phishing

phishing_samples.text: FINAL NOTICE: Your subscription expires today! Act now to avoid service interruption. Update your payment method here.
phishing_samples.label: phishing

phishing_samples.text: Security Alert: We detected a login attempt from an unknown device. If this wasn't you, click here to secure your account immediately.
phishing_samples.label: phishing

legitimate_samples.text: Thank you for your recent purchase from Amazon. Your order #123456789 has been shipped and will arrive within 2-3 business days. Track your package in your account.
legitimate_samples.label: legitimate

legitimate_samples.text: Your monthly bank statement is now available. You can view it by logging into your online banking account or visiting any of our branch locations.
legitimate_samples.label: legitimate

legitimate_samples.text: Reminder: Your appointment with Dr. Smith is scheduled for tomorrow at 2:00 PM. Please arrive 15 minutes early for check-in.
legitimate_samples.label: legitimate

legitimate_samples.text: Your Netflix subscription will renew on March 15th for $12.99. You can manage your subscription settings in your account preferences.
legitimate_samples.label: legitimate

legitimate_samples.text: Welcome to our newsletter! Here are this week's top technology news and updates from our editorial team.
legitimate_samples.label: legitimate

test_cases.text: Your account security needs immediate attention! Verify now to prevent unauthorized access.
Thank you for contacting customer support. Your ticket #12345 has been created and will be reviewed within 24 hours.
WINNER! You've been selected for our exclusive promotion. Click to claim your $500 gift card before it expires!
